title: Street art singed
body:
I don't have a picture or anything but it's all in my mind
* In this skin singed leaves a trail of paint and he wears a hoodie and instead of his normal mask, a vandalising mask and has a massive spray can on his back and a cool taunt could be he spays a riot multicoloured riot symbol, during this you can hear like spraying and can shaking 
Q- trail of coloured paint 
w- paint splat on floor 
e- normal 
r- paint dripping every where 
What do you think??

replies.body: Thanks a lot ur sooooo {{champion:150}} ly
I think it's a cool idea.
